    • Method Detail

      • colorRay

        public static ColorValue colorRay​(Ray r,
                                  Hittable world,
                                  int depth,
                                  Background background)
        Method that recive a ray direction (from camera) and go through the array of elements in scene checking colisions and obtaining the color of the hit object
        Parameters:
        r - Ray to use
        world - list of items to hit with other information
        depth - how many bounces are allowed
        Returns:
        a color value

      • gammaCorrection

        public static double gammaCorrection​(double value,
                                     double correctionValue)
        Method to obtain the gamma correction value
        Parameters:
        value - initial value
        correctionValue - value for correction
        Returns:
        double with the gamma correction value

      • clamp

        public static double clamp​(double x,
                           double min,
                           double max)
        Method to clamp the image to max and min values to avoid burned areas
        Parameters:
        x - value
        min - min
        max - max
        Returns:
        return the clamped value (if needed)
